title.rendered: “IDF Strikes Hezbollah: Targeting Terrorist Infrastructure in Southern Lebanon”

content.rendered:
IDF Spokesperson:

A terrorist from the organization and terrorist infrastructure; the IDF attacked Hezbollah targets in Lebanese territory.

Earlier today, aircraft targeted and eliminated a terrorist from the Hezbollah terrorist organization in the area of El-Nakura in southern Lebanon. Additionally, fighter jets attacked terrorist infrastructure and a military building belonging to the organization in the areas of Aita al-Shaab and al-Adaysa in southern Lebanon.

Furthermore, the IDF conducted artillery fire to remove threats in the areas of Kafr Shuba, Shihine, Hula, Rashaya al-Fukhari, and Majdal Zoun in southern Lebanon.

This morning (Tuesday), a suspicious aerial target was spotted crossing from Lebanese territory and fell in the Har Hermon area, with no casualties. The incident is under investigation.

Attached is documentation from the attacks: https://bit.ly/4e5zUG6
